description: This solicitation covers a requirement amongst the PSIB stream from product categories 1-2-5 of the supply arrangement. PSPC has a requirement for the purchase of office furniture to Ottawa (Ontario) for delivery and installation by 2023/01/02. There is a security requirement associated with this requirement.
tags: Requirement of office furniture for Ottawa
full_summary:
### EP916-240502 Workspaces Cat 1-2-5
#### EP916-240502 Espaces de travail Cat 1-2-5

Tender Reference | *WS4117914196-Doc4119419403*
 Amendment Number | *4*
 Solicitation Number | *WS4117914196*
 Publication Date | 2023-07-27
 Tender Closing Date | 2023-08-17T14:00:00

#### Background and Requirements

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking bids for the procurement of office furniture for the National Capital Region (NCR). The scope of work includes the purchase of office furniture to be delivered and installed in Ottawa (Ontario) by 2024-01-02. The security requirements associated with this procurement must be met.

#### Tender Details

* Tender category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Evaluation criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact person: Sell, Nancy (SPAC/PSPC) (PSPC and SPAC will use she/her communication)
* Contact e-mail: nancy.sell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17000432?extsite=MTcwMDA0MzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Expiration and Status of the Tender
The tender is expired, and no further updates are expected. Bidders must have submitted their bids before the deadline on 2023-08-17T14:00:00. The expected contract start date is 2023-09-14, with no expected contract end date specified. The contract will be administered by the PSPC.  Back to [Top](#) ###
